org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.support.format

Interface ValueFormatter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Streamable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ValueFormatter.BooleanFormatter, ValueFormatter.DateTime, ValueFormatter.GeoHash, ValueFormatter.IPv4Formatter, ValueFormatter.Number, ValueFormatter.Number.Pattern, ValueFormatter.Raw

    public interface ValueFormatter
extends Streamable
    A strategy for formatting time represented as millis long value to string
